intro.start: <speak>Hello! <break time='800ms'/> The following is an audio abstract for "${pubTitle}"<break time='1s'/></speak>
intro.end: <speak><break time='1s'/>You've been listening to an audio abstract of "${pubTitle}" which you can read in its entirety on OECD i-Library as of <say-as interpret-as='date' format='yyyy-mm-dd' detail='1'>${pubDate}</say-as>. <break time='1s'/> If you don't mind, we'd like you to tell us what you think of this new audio abstract service. <break time='1s'/>You find the link to a short survey in the track description. <break time='1s'/>Thank you!</speak>

intro.start: <speak>Bonjour! <break time='800ms'/> Ce qui suit est un résumé audio de la publication "${pubTitle}"<break time='1s'/></speak>
intro.end: <speak><break time='1s'/>Vous venez d'écouter un résumé audio de la publication "${pubTitle}" que vous pouvez lire entièrement sur OECD i-Library à partir du <say-as interpret-as='date' format='yyyy-mm-dd' detail='1'>${pubDate}</say-as>. <break time='1s'/> Si vous avez une minute, nous aimerions avoir votre avis sur ce nouveau service. <break time='1s'/>Vous trouverez un lien vers le questionnaire dans la description du résumé. <break time='1s'/>Merci beaucoup!</speak>
